long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Link Counter Chrome Extension is a powerful tool designed to help you quickly and easily count links on any webpage. Whether you're a web developer, SEO specialist, or simply curious about the links on a page, Link Counter provides the insights you need.

Key Features:

Count Internal Links: Identify and count all the internal links within the main content area of a webpage.
Count External Links: Detect and tally all external links, helping you analyze outbound linking strategies.
Total Link Count: Get a comprehensive total of both internal and external links.
Context Menu Integration: Easily count links in any selected text by right-clicking and choosing the "Count Links in Selected Text" option.
User-Friendly Interface: View link counts in a clean, intuitive popup window with just a click of the extension icon.
Install Link Counter today to streamline your link analysis and enhance your web browsing experience.
